title: Crypt jnr

content: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5453626.0 from this post my answer is if with the current progress of Bitcoin and estimated future of the crypto verse you still feel crypto is not worth investing.Wait a little longer and pls don't invest so when Bitcoin hits 100k I will sell a fraction of my hodling to you üòÅ

comments.author: Crypt jnr
comments.body: Hw many times have you gone through replies at the bottom

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt jnr on May 30, 2023, 09:17:44 PMHw many times have you gone through replies at the bottom If you feel no one will read your comment on that thread then don't make it and that does not justify the fact that you have just created a thread with no value.And besides, the Op of that thread you copied the link of said he needs "reason" why should he should buy bitcoin, he didn't ask for "when" he should buy, meaning your ppost is kinda off topic.I have to agree with what @Agbe said, it's best you lock this thread or delete it if possible and then think of a more suitable response to the thread and if it turns out that you couldn't think of any then call it a quit.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt jnr on May 30, 2023, 09:17:44 PMHw many times have you gone through replies at the bottom That‚Äôs not good enough reason to start a topic to reply a existing thread. The thread is already eight pages long, it‚Äôs likely someone has already mentioned what you want to say or the OP is already satisfied with the replies. But if you want visibility, you should show up to the thread more faster. BTW your answer isn‚Äôt very helpful to the OP imo.
